UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Stores the user's profile information, including their resume/CV.

resumeSummary.description: An AI-generated summary of the resume.

resumeFileName.description: The name of the originally uploaded resume file.

JobApplication.title: JobApplication
JobApplication.description: Stores information about a specific job application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the JobApplication entity.

companyName.description: The name of the company the application was submitted to.

jobTitle.description: The title of the job applied for.

jobDescription.description: The full text of the job description.

status.description: The current status of the application.

coverLetter.description: The generated cover letter for the application.

coldEmail.description: The generated cold email for the application.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the application was created.

/users/{userId}/profile/main.description: Stores the user's single profile document.

/users/{userId}/applications/{applicatio.description: Stores job applications for a specific user.
